title: How to Make an Origami Kite Base

steps.headline: Place a square piece of origami paper on a flat surface.
steps.description: A table is ideal to work on.

steps.headline: Fold the paper in half, diagonally.
steps.description: This fold should bring together two opposite corners neatly.

steps.headline: Unfold the paper again.
steps.description: Rotate it so that the crease you've just made points vertically in front of you, or so that you're looking down on a diamond with a crease down the middle.

steps.headline: Fold each of the lower sloping outer edges inward.
steps.description: Make them lie flush with the crease in the middle. This forms the kite shape.

text: Place a square piece of origami paper on a flat surface. A table is ideal to work on. Fold the paper in half, diagonally. This fold should bring together two opposite corners neatly. Unfold the paper again. Rotate it so that the crease you've just made points vertically in front of you, or so that you're looking down on a diamond with a crease down the middle. Fold each of the lower sloping outer edges inward. Make them lie flush with the crease in the middle. This forms the kite shape. Finished.
